description: Deepest position in the deck reached by card 1 before returning to the top in the shuffle in A035485 and A035499.
comments: The number of shuffles to return to the top is A035499. This sequence gives the deepest card 1 gets between returns to the top.
example: Card 1 gets to the 4th position before returning to the top after 3 shuffles, so 4 is in the sequence. Then it gets to the 8th position before returning to the top on the 7th shuffle, so 8 is in the sequence, etc.
author: _Jud McCranie_, Oct 22 2000
